initialize((address,uint256,address[],ui.details: Need to init __PriceResolver before _addToken,since addToken need Price resolver to check the token is support or not

params._allowAllAddresses: Boolean flag to indicate if the BA can sent to any addresses
params._allowAnyAmount: Boolean flag to indicate if any amount of tokens can be transferred
params._baseCurrency: Address of the token that serves as the base currency
params._toAddresses: Array of addresses that are allowed to receive
params._toTeamIds: array of teamId that are allowed to receive
params._tokens: Array of token addresses that can be transferred
params._totalAmount: Total number of tokens that can be transferred
params.params: InitializeParams struct containing data required for initialization

assetBaseCurrencyPrice(address,uint256).notice: This function is imported by other contract, thus cannot be external

canResolvePrice(address).notice: This function is imported by other contract, thus cannot be external
